name: Kobold, Leviathan Hunter
description: The Kobold Leviathan Hunter is a medium-sized humanoid with a strong build and cunning eyes, capable of navigating both underwater and on land.
memorable: Its unique ability to grapple creatures significantly larger than itself makes it a surprising and dangerous opponent in combat.
goals: The Leviathan Hunter typically seeks to control larger aquatic creatures and protect its territory from intruders.
relations: It might be found in the company of other aquatic creatures or allied Kobolds, often working together to ambush foes.
environment: Commonly found in aquatic environments, such as rivers, lakes, or coastal areas.
strengths: Resilient due to high hit points and resistance to bludgeoning and cold damage; excels in grappling and teamwork.
weaknesses: Sensitive to sunlight, imposing disadvantages on its attacks and perception checks when in bright light.
attacks: Can perform multiple slam attacks or use a harpoon that causes ongoing piercing damage to its target.
most_powerful_ability: Expert Wrestler - grants the ability to grapple much larger creatures, controlling bigger foes with ease.
senses: Has darkvision allowing for excellent visibility in dark environments, providing a passive perception score of 16.
skills: Possesses decent perception abilities with a +2 modifier.
additional_information: Can hold its breath for up to 30 minutes, making it a capable swimmer.
Weapon attacks deal additional cold or poison damage, enhancing its threat level.
Advantage on checks to track large swimming creatures, showing its keen hunting ability.
Utilizes pack tactics for effective teamwork during combat.
Employs grappling tactics to divert attacks away from itself to the grappled creature.
test_queries: Kobold that hunts large swimming creatures
grappling expert in an aquatic environment
Kobold sensitive to sunlight but tough
